comments.raw_text:
Use Case:
1) Find picture on internet I want to share (to upload for posterity, not link to)
2) Copy URL
3) Go to Twitter
4) Click "Upload image to Twitter"
5) Input URL
6) Image is both downloaded (temporarily) to the computer and uploaded to Twitter at the same time

Currently I:
1) Find picture on internet I want to share (to upload for posterity, not link to)
2) Download image into Downloads
3) Go to Twitter
4) Click "Upload image to Twitter"
5) Search around for a while until I find the correct filename
6) Image is uploaded


Note that there are a multitude use cases with any file found on the internet placed in any upload form. It prevents cruft in my downloads, prevents extra steps of having to finding the file, and makes us even more web friendly. Let's keep users out of their FS as much as possible.
